children.text:
• Referral program is available on Android and iOS app
• Invite your friends to join redBus using your unique referral code/link and get amazing rewards!
• As soon as your friend signs-up with redBus using your referral code/link, they will receive 20 MYR in their redBus Wallet.
• You will get 10 MYR in your redBus Wallet after your friend signs up with redBus.
• You can find your unique referral code in 'Refer & Earn’ section.

Terms & Conditions:
• This offer is live till 31st March 2017. Any referral made before and after the offer period would not be eligible for the reward.
• The referee will get the reward of 20 MYR as offer cash in their redBus wallet within 24 working hours post signup.
• Only signups where a phone number is provided and is verified through OTP will be eligible for the reward.
• The referrer will get the reward of 10 MYR as offer cash in their redBus wallet within 24 hours of his friend signing up with redBus.
• Only one signup is allowed per device. So referee and referral rewards will not be given if both the referee and the referral were on the same device.
• The offer cash is valid for 6 months from the day it is credited into the wallet, after which it will expire and cannot be used.
• Maximum reward that a referrer can earn through their referrals is 50 MYR.
• Ibibo Group Sdn. Bhd. reserves the right to end and change any or all offers at its discretion without any prior notice.
• Accounts suspicious of doing fraud will be blacklisted from getting any benefits under the Referral Program.
• All current and past agents, who have either done or are currently doing business with redBus, are excluded from getting any benefit under the Referral Program.
• All disputes are subject to Malaysia jurisdiction.

1. Use referral code MYBONUS in 'I have a referral code' section during sign up to get 20 MYR reward in your redBus wallet.
2. Offer is valid only for new sign ups on mobile apps.
3. This offer is valid till 31st March 2017. Any signup using this referral code before and after the offer period would not be eligible for the reward.
4. The user will get the reward of 20 MYR as offer cash in their redBus wallet within 24 working hours post signup.
5. redBus offer cash will be credited only post successful verification of mobile number with OTP (one time password).
6. redBus offer cash is valid for 6 months from the day it is credited into the wallet, after which it will expire and cannot be used.
7. Offer is applicable only ONCE per user.
8. Offer is not valid for bookings made by travel agents. Ibibo Group Sdn. Bhd. reserves the right to cancel bookings made by travel agents and/or if it suspects the bookings to be fraudulent in nature.
9. Ibibo Group Sdn. Bhd. reserves the right to end any or all offers at its discretion without any prior notice.
10. All disputes are subject to jurisdiction of Malaysia courts.
